welcome_message_body: Welcome to Trece Martires City, a charming and vibrant city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore our city and enjoy all it has to offer!

restaurants.name: Republic of Cavite
restaurants.description: Republic of Cavite is a asian restaurant located in Cavite.

restaurants.name: Red Ribbon
restaurants.description: Red Ribbon is a bakery located in the city.

restaurants.name: Shakey’s
restaurants.description: Shakey’s is a pizzeria located in Trece Martires City.

restaurants.name: Shakey’s
restaurants.description: Shakey’s is a pizzeria located in the city.

restaurants.name: Dunkin'
restaurants.description: Dunkin' is a donut shop located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, this terminal serves Philippine Airlines and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, this terminal serves domestic flights operated by budget airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow and unreliable at times.
